title: Glary.Utilities.PRO.2.26.0.956
description:
Glary Utilities PRO - tvikerov and a set of system utilities to fine tune, to protect and enhance the overall PC performance. Glary Utilities enables to get rid of unnecessary files, zahlamlyayuschih system obsolete entries in the registry, the history of Internet activity, as well as to optimize the RAM, correct incorrect tags, delete files without the possibility of recovery, etc.With the help of Glary Utilities user can also manage (including delete) the various modules used to expand the functionality of your browser, monitor the effectiveness of the use of disk space and search for existing copies of certain files. Furthermore, Glary Utilities will optimize the use of system memory, search, and fix or delete broken shortcuts, edit the list of programs that are loaded along with the operating system, and removal of these applications. Also the search function of empty directories and delete files without the possibility of their subsequent recovery.
